alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 18 at 12:51PM EDT until October 19 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 11 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Higher Elevations of Westmoreland and Higher Elevations of Fayette Counties. In West Virginia, Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston, Preston and Eastern Preston Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 11 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Freeze conditions may kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect outdoor plumbing and to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston
